Title: Der Berg
Writer: Thomas Hürlimann (screenplay), Thomas Hürlimann (story), Markus Imhoof
Actors: Susanne Lothar, Mathias Gnädinger, Peter Simonischek, Agnes Fink
Plot: Since 1886, there has been a weather-station master at the summit of the mountain. He telegraphs his daily measurements into the valley from where they are transmitted to Rome, Paris, Berlin and Vienna.
